definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_checkgamemode"><field name="gamemode">CREATIVE</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><user0> Oh, so you want to play like that? </field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">40</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">ยงo[SERVER: made user0 a server operator]</field></block></value><next><block type="wait"><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">20</field></block></value><statement name="do"><block type="world_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"><user0> ยง4LET'S PLAY!</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_set_gamemode"><field name="gamemode">SURVIVAL</field><value name="entity"><block type="source_entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
